# Carousel Examples

This document demonstrates the quarto-carousel extension with different syntax options.


## Example 0: Simplest carousels

Only images

:::: {.carousel id="asd"}

![The same but different](assets/imgs/assymetric_laplace.png)

:::

Only text

:::: {.carousel id="asd2" autoplay="false"}
